Question
========
  
In one study, a group of alcoholics and a group of non-addicts were examined to determine the degree of salsolinol excretion ($\mu$grams/24 hours) measured three weeks after they were randomly assigned to (i) a placebo treatment or (ii) a St. John's wort treatment. Which technique can best be used to determine whether the use of the herb in both groups has the same effect on salsinol- excretion? 
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA.
* ANOVA with one factor.
* ANOVA with two factors.
* Single-factor regression.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
